original_title: ‘Cooperative Square’ to be constructed as a public, private, cooperative partnership project
original_body_lines: The Cabinet of Ministers granted approval to the resolution furnished by the Minister of Trade, Commerce and Food Security to construct a cooperative trade centre named ‘Cooperative Square’ as a public, private and  cooperative partnership project, without being a burden to the consolidated fund as recommended by the  National Development Committee.
